title: Textile, ca. 1845
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Repeat H: 44.5 cm (17 1/2 in.)
Warp x Weft (a): 210 x 74 cm (6 ft. 10 11/16 in. x 29 1/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 209 x 74 cm (6 ft. 10 5/16 in. x 29 1/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 210 x 74 cm (6 ft. 10 11/16 in. x 29 1/8 in.)
description: Red. Romantic scenes of three couples in lattice of scrolls and cartouche. If lengths were sewn together side-to-side, design would repeat as a half drop. About 1" of design on roller is missing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1845.
ca. 1845. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1968-135-106-a/c.
